meanings.definition: Relating to or reproducing sound using two or more channels.
meanings.sent1: The stereophonic music system made the concert sound more realistic.
meanings.sent2: I love listening to music on my stereophonic headphones.
meanings.sent3: The stereophonic speakers danced to the beat of the music.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room in a stereophonic manner.
meanings.sent5: The stereophonic sound of the waves crashing on the shore was mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: A system of sound recording and reproduction using two or more channels.
meanings.sent1: The new stereophonic was a hit among audiophiles.
meanings.sent2: The concert hall was equipped with state-of-the-art stereophonic technology.
meanings.sent3: The stereophonic at the party malfunctioned, playing music in reverse.
meanings.sent4: His voice filled the room like a powerful stereophonic instrument.
meanings.sent5: The movie theater boasted a top-of-the-line stereophonic system for an immersive experience.
